name: BaconSounds
0:
”Alexa open bacon sounds”
”Alexa ask bacon sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bacon sounds
des: Let our bacon sizzle you right to sleep. The best bacon sizzles on Alexa, complete with everything but the glorious smell. Unwind after a long day, find solace during meditation, or create a soothing atmosphere for work or study. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Bacon Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. Or, ask for her to play it all night long. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
